meanings.definition: The act of making a new law or regulation officially known and publicly available.
meanings.sent1: The promulgation of the new rule was posted on the bulletin board.
meanings.sent2: The promulgation of the law was broadcasted on national television.
meanings.sent3: The promulgation of the regulation caused quite a stir in the community.
meanings.sent4: Her promulgation of the policy set a clear standard for everyone to follow.
meanings.sent5: The promulgation of the decree was met with both praise and criticism.

meanings.definition: The official announcement or proclamation of a new law or regulation.
meanings.sent1: After the promulgation of the decree, everyone knew about the new law.
meanings.sent2: The promulgation of the regulation was made during the press conference.
meanings.sent3: The promulgation of the law was celebrated with a parade in the town square.
meanings.sent4: His promulgation of the policy was like a beacon of change in the organization.
meanings.sent5: The promulgation of the announcement brought clarity to the situation.
